_metadata.description: Virtual file system for terminal simulation

README.md.content:
# Welcome to AbdulmeLink Portfolio Terminal! ðŸš€

This is a fully functional terminal simulation built with xterm.js.

Available commands:
- ls: List directory contents
- cd: Change directory
- cat: Display file contents
- help: Show all commands
- whoami: Display user info
- neofetch: System information

Games:
- snake: Play Snake game
- tictactoe: Play Tic-tac-toe
- typing-test: Test your typing speed

Enjoy exploring! âœ¨

# AbdulmeLink Portfolio

A pixel-perfect LinkOS desktop experience built with Laravel and vanilla JavaScript.

## Features
- 27 dynamic wallpapers
- Authentic LinkOS dock
- Terminal with xterm.js
- Portfolio showcase
- Preferences system

## Performance
- <3s initial load
- 60fps animations
- Progressive enhancement

notes.md.content:
# Development Notes

## Portfolio Project Goals
- [x] Authentic LinkOS experience
- [x] 60fps smooth animations
- [x] Progressive loading system
- [ ] Advanced terminal games
- [ ] Theme customization

## Performance Targets
- Initial load: <3 seconds
- Animation FPS: 60 (desktop), 30 (mobile)
- Memory usage: <100MB
- Bundle size: <2MB gzipped

## Browser Support
- Chrome: Optimized
- Firefox: Compatible
- Safari: Compatible
- Edge: Basic support

.bashrc.content:
# Terminal configuration
export PS1='abdulmelik@portfolio:~$ '
export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/bin

# Aliases
alias ll='ls -la'
alias la='ls -A'
alias l='ls -CF'
alias cls='clear'

# Welcome message
echo "Welcome to AbdulmeLink Portfolio Terminal! ðŸš€"

.profile.content:
# User profile settings
USER=abdulmelik
HOME=/home/abdulmelik
SHELL=/bin/bash
TERM=xterm-256color

os-release.content:
NAME="AbdulmeLink Terminal"
VERSION="1.0.0"
ID=abdulme-terminal
PRETTY_NAME="AbdulmeLink Portfolio Terminal v1.0.0"
HOME_URL="https://abdulme.link"
